---
title: Plotting Connect Prometheus Metrics from Datadog 
categories:
    - python 
    - metrics 
    - prometheus
    - datadog
---

This Streamlit Python application allows users to query Datadog for 
Connect Prometheus metrics such as total jobs in queue and content 
visits. Users are able to select a metric and timeframe to query. 
A plot displays the timeseries data returned from Datadog.
